titles.title: Justice is Not For Sale Act of 2020
Justice is Not For Sale Act of 2020
Justice is Not For Sale Act of 2020
To prohibit the use of for-profit facilities and detention centers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Financial Services, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
